 2007-04452007-03-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActAuditor General Act
PrecisRequest to the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA to inquire into the financial aid received by the Lieutenant Governor of Quebec for the period starting on April 1, 2000 and ending March 31, 2006, to ensure that the proper financial and management processes and controls were in place in respect to the disbursements of that aid and provide a report to the Minister.
AttachmentsAttachment
